data.title: The Throne of Saturn by S. Fowler Wright: Near Fine Cloth (1951) First edition.
data.meta_description: First edition. - Cloth - William Heinemann, London - 1951 - Condition: Near Fine - Very Good - A smart first UK edition of this imaginative collection of science fiction stories from S. Fowler Wright, with the original unclipped dust wrapper. First UK edition. Unusually published earlier in the United States in 1949. With the original unclipped dust wrapper. A collection of science fiction short stories, including: Justice, Brain, Proof, Automata, Choice, and more. Written by Sydney Fowler Wright, a British editor, poet, science fiction author, screenwriter, accountant and a conservative political activist. In the original red cloth binding. Externally, excellent. Original unclipped dust wrapper is smart with light wear and the odd small closed tear to the extremities. Sunning to the spine with the odd small mark to the panels. Two 2" closed tears to the rear panel with some creases. Internally, firmly bound. Pages are very bright and clean with the odd spot to the fore edge. Light age toning to the endpapers. Near Fine - The Throne of Saturn
data.text:
About this Item

A smart first UK edition of this imaginative collection of science fiction stories from S. Fowler Wright, with the original unclipped dust wrapper. First UK edition. Unusually published earlier in the United States in 1949. With the original unclipped dust wrapper. A collection of science fiction short stories, including: Justice, Brain, Proof, Automata, Choice, and more. Written by Sydney Fowler Wright, a British editor, poet, science fiction author, screenwriter, accountant and a conservative political activist. In the original red cloth binding. Externally, excellent. Original unclipped dust wrapper is smart with light wear and the odd small closed tear to the extremities. Sunning to the spine with the odd small mark to the panels. Two 2" closed tears to the rear panel with some creases. Internally, firmly bound. Pages are very bright and clean with the odd spot to the fore edge. Light age toning to the endpapers. Near Fine. Seller Inventory # 902T73
